title: NASA Astronaut Jonny Kim to Discuss Eight-Month Space Station Mission
summary: NASA astronaut Jonny Kim will recap his recent mission aboard the International Space Station during a news conference at 3:30 p.m. EST Friday, Dec. 19, from the agency’s Johnson Space Center in Houston. title: Intuitive Machines and Telespazio to collaborate on lunar satellite networks
summary:
Intuitive Machines will work with Telespazio on their planned lunar satellite networks to ensure interoperability and improve performance.

title: NASA’s Webb, Curiosity Named in TIME’s Best Inventions Hall of Fame
summary: Two icons of discovery, NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope and NASA’s Curiosity rover, have earned places in TIME’s “Best Inventions Hall of Fame,” which recognizes the 25 groundbreaking inventions of the past quarter century that have had the most global impact, since TIME began its annual Best Inventions list in 2000. The inventions are celebrated […]

title: Study: Current, future megaconstellations risk space-based astronomy
summary: Researchers from NASA’s Ames Research Center sound alarm about current and projected impacts to observatories, like the Hubble Space Telescope and others.

title: China plans 2026 debut of new rocket for crewed lunar and LEO missions
summary:
China is building towards a debut Long March 10 rocket launch in what will be a major test for the country’s crewed lunar landing plans.
The post China plans 2026 debut of new rocket for crewed lunar and LEO missions appeared first on SpaceNews.

title: A Rare Gourd
summary: NASA’s Hubble Space Telescope captured an uncommon sight – the death of a low-mass star – in this image of the Calabash Nebula released on Feb. 3, 2017. Here, we can see the star going through a rapid transformation from a red giant to a planetary nebula, during which it blows its outer layers of […]

summary:

title: NASA Announces Plan to Map Milky Way With Roman Space Telescope
summary: NASA’s Nancy Grace Roman Space Telescope team has released detailed plans for a major survey that will reveal our home galaxy, the Milky Way, in unprecedented detail.
